channel.title: Studio: Spa User Validation :: Java Web Development
channel.description: We’ll build on the User Signup studio from last class, adding in model validation. Getting Started Open up your spaday application and checkout the user-signup-pt2 branch. Add Validation Annotations Navigate to the User model class. Add validation annotations to ensure these conditions are satisfied: Username, password, and verify are required (they can’t be empty) Username is between 5 and 15 characters Email is optional If provided, the email has the format of a valid email address.
